title: korean bot/top lane swap strat
body:
anyone found any success in this?
only ever done it as rengar against a jinx + support. dont think this counts tho as rengar is freelo.

replies.body: Rengar is Melee and find it hard to farm under tower. Jinx would be able to poke him extremely easily and if he steps on choppers then he is good as dead. Its better with the current ranged/semi ranged meta top laners such as gnar, lissandra and rumble.

I have not.
I think knowing how and when to double to jungle would be to complicated to coordinate of not premade.
did the koreans really invent it? you would think someone thought "lets send two people top and one person top" before the korean server was made.
